answers.text: Event-driven, serverless compute service that enables you to run code without provisioning or managing servers
Highly scalable, high-performance container management service which supports Docker containers
Managed Kubernetes service that makes it easy for you to run Kubernetes on AWS
Fully managed Docker container registry that makes it easy for developers to store, manage, and deploy Docker container images
Platform as a service (or PaaS) that facilitates the quick deployment, scaling, and management of your web applications and services
